features: 【Crystal Clear 1080p Footage】With this 2MP security camera ,you can see everything clearly that matters in 1080p HD, easily recognize the details you need in smooth and clear videos, leaving nothing to the imagination.

【IP66 Weatherproof & Dustproof】Built with IP66 weatherproof housing, the CCTV camera is able to endure whatever mother nature brings, thus keep out dust, water and air. It is tested that it can perform well even in extreme temperature from -40 °C to 60 °C.
【Note】Requires BNC video and 2.1mm DC power cable (not included, available separately)

【Security Cameras Suitable for All Places】This camera can be widely used in apartments, offices, garages, shopping malls, etc. Keep everything under control. It will be one of the most worthy investments to protect the safety of your families and business.

【Tech Support & Worry-Free Warranty】 All our products are CE, FCC and HDMI certified and adopt information protection technology of military grade, to protect your property and data. We also provide a 2-year warranty, warm customer services and lifetime tech support. If you have any questions. Contact us via email, phone call, WhatsApp, social media for instant replies.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 100FT Night Vision Distance Night vision distance of 1080P security camera reaches to 100ft/30m, which helps to see and to see afar in the night. Smart IR Night Vision Provide sufficient lighting for crystal images at night Deliver up to 100 ft night vision range in dim conditions.
Adjustable 3-Axis Bracket Adjust cameras' angle and field of view effortlessly.

IP66 Weatherproof Rated IP66 waterproof and dust-proof, this camera braves all harsh conditions and is never afraid of pouring rain or heavy snow. WDR Helps Stay Sharp Farewell to blind spots due to strong light contrast. With a digital WDR function, this camera catches sharp pictures even under strong contrast. 3D DNR Be Invulnerable to Noise Equipped with the latest 3D DNR, the cam reduces noise and brings clear images in the dark while other regular cams can't get rid of the noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality at a good price
reviews.reviewText: I got an Annke security DVR system a few months back to replace a 2006 era Q-SEE wired camera system, and I recently got around to installing it. The old system was a 4 camera one, and the new Annke system is an 8 camera system, but the model I ordered shipped with 4 cameras. I had planned to simply use my old cameras with the new system to fill in the remaining slots. However, after seeing the MASSIVE improvement in video quality, night vision quality (IR illumination), and an number of other factors, I decided to order 4 more matching cameras to upgrade to all 8 HD cameras. I didn't spend a ton to get a 4k system, but I am still quite impressed with the quality of the HD cameras (1920x1080). I can easily zoom in and read license plates, get good facial views on people, and see smaller details on animals, day or night. It's a huge improvement over the 960x480 system I had before, and for the price point, I'm very satisfied. I didn't have to swap out any wiring to replace my old cameras, and it was straightforward to wire up the new ones. So far, I'm impressed with the performance (and the DVR is SILENT, especially compared to my old one!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Needed to replace a couple bad cameras and didn't want to spend a small fortune to do so. I found these at an amazing price and the quality is surpasses the original cameras from a named brand. Highly recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great seller, build quality isn't the best. Video is good.
reviews.reviewText: It has decent video resolution but the camera quality itself is cheap. It's a plastic material and could easily be broken if dropped or twisted too hard one way or the other. Night vision isn't the best either.UPDATE: September 5, 2017, I have decided to give the camera four stars. The response from the seller about my review was greatly appreciated. They contacted me to make sure I was satisfied and to ensure I wasn't having any trouble and that if I was that they could help me with anything I needed. I love sellers like these because it shows that they truly care about their customers. The camera quality itself is very good, the night vision outside isn't the best but inside it is very good. My big issue was the actual build quality it is a cheap type of plastic. Where I live one strong wind could break the plastic arm in half. I have replaced this camera outside with an aluminum one but am now using this camera inside. The camera so far has met my expectations as an indoor surveillance camera.Thanks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great night vision and day vision
reviews.reviewText: This camera works great with annke system and have great night vision and day vision. the only problem with them is the material they use to make the frame should be more durable. I will continue to buy these camera because they have great night vision and day vision and you can identify the image very simple and easy and effectively

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, seriously great camera for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I keep buying these cameras because my old ones which costs $150+ each kept dying and not working after like just a year =/So, I saw these on Amazon and bought one just to try it out. Once I connected it, I noticed it has a wider aspect of view and clearer image as well. It's a 1080p camera and the image never looked more alive on the monitor. So I began switching them all out slowly and I couldn't be happier. Let's see how long these last. So far, so good!
